error.invalidhealth: Invalid health value: must be a number
error.invalidpower: Invalid power value: must be a number
error.invalidspeed: Invalid speed value: must be a number
error.invaliddifficulty: Invalid difficulty, must be normal, hard, expert, master, or torment
error.invalidskillname: Invalid skill, no such skill available
error.invalideffectpass: duration effect requires duration value in format effect:duration
error.invalidskilltype: Invalid skill type: must be immediate, duration, or passive
error.missingdmgmulti: missing damage multiplier for non-passive skill
error.invalidskilltypeeffect: Invalid effect: cant be used with this skilltype

normal.name: Normal
normal.message: Keeping it casual, I respect that

hard.name: Hard
hard.message: Now we're talking, time to break a sweat

expert.name: Expert
expert.message: Getting spicy, hope you brought your A-game

master.name: Master
master.message: Bold move champ, your keyboard might need insurance

torment.name: Torment
torment.message: Quite the sadist, aren't we? Let the pain begin

gamemessage.welcome: Welcome to Arcade Battle - a text-based RPG where you create and customize a unique character! Spend talent points to build your character's stats (health, power, speed) and create custom skills with various effects. Battle through 9 increasingly difficult bosses, earning new talent points with each victory. But be careful - one defeat means permanent death and you'll need to create a new character. Choose your difficulty wisely: higher difficulties offer fewer talent points but a greater challenge. Create powerful skill combinations, manage your resources carefully, and see if you can defeat all 9 bosses!
gamemessage.gamestart: Game started. Type 'status' to see your current status. Type 'quit' to exit.
gamemessage.gamestarthelp: Type 'help' to get a feeling for the game =)
gamemessage.goodbyebattle: You cowardly left the Battlefield, battle will be resetted!

help.note: Note: Type 'help <command>' for more detailed information about a specific command

directdamage.name: Direct Damage
directdamage.description: Deals immediate damage based on power stat and multiplier

pierce.name: Pierce
pierce.description: Ignores shield effects and deals partial damage directly to health

finisher.name: Finisher
finisher.description: Adds bonus damage if enemy is low on health

buffturnbonusdamage.name: Buff Turn Bonus Damage
buffturnbonusdamage.description: Bonus damage based on amount of all remaining buff turns

debuffturnbonusdamage.name: Debuff Turn Bonus Damage
debuffturnbonusdamage.description: Bonus damage based on amount of all remaining debuff turns of enemy

directheal.name: Direct Heal
directheal.description: Immediately restores health based on power stat

lifeleech.name: Life Leech
lifeleech.description: Gain 50% of your damage in health

cleanse.name: Cleanse
cleanse.description: Removes all negative effects from the target

dispel.name: Dispel
dispel.description: Removes all positive effects from the target

blockdebuffs.name: Block Debuffs
blockdebuffs.description: Prevents new debuffs from being applied while active

healovertime.name: Heal Over Time
healovertime.description: Restores health at the start of each turn

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: Creates a defensive barrier that blocks direct damage and some effects

reflectdamage.name: Reflect Damage
reflectdamage.description: Reflect 50% of the damage you receive

stun.name: Stun
stun.description: Prevents the target from taking any actions

blockbuffs.name: Block Buffs
blockbuffs.description: Prevents the target from receiving buffs and healing effects

dot.name: Damage Over Time
dot.description: Applies a damaging effect that deals damage at the start of each turn

newplayer.name: new player
newplayer.detail: Creates a new player with specified stats using talent points based on chosen difficulty

newskill.name: new skill
newskill.description: Create a new skill for your character
newskill.detail: Creates a new skill with specified parameters using available talent points
newskill.example: new skill Fireball duration 1.5 dot:3 stun:5

newimmediateskill.name: new skill immediate
newimmediateskill.description: Create a new immediate skill for your character
newimmediateskill.detail: Creates a new immediate skill with direct, instant effects using available talent points
newimmediateskill.example: new skill immediate Fireball 1.5 directdamage pierce

newdurationskill.name: new skill duration
newdurationskill.description: Create a new duration skill for your character
newdurationskill.detail: Creates a new skill with effects that last for multiple turns using available talent points
newdurationskill.example: new skill duration PoisonCloud 1.2 3 dot grievouswounds

newpassiveskill.name: new skill passive
newpassiveskill.description: Create a new passive skill for your character
newpassiveskill.detail: Creates a new passive skill that provides constant benefits without activation
newpassiveskill.example: new skill passive Resilience blockdebuffs damagereduction

status.name: status
status.description: Display current player stats and game state
status.detail: Shows detailed information about your character including health, power, speed, skills, and current state

help.name: help
help.description: Show available commands and their usage
help.detail: Displays a list of all available commands with descriptions and examples

quit.name: quit
quit.detail: Saves current game state and exits the application

test.name: test
test.detail: Executes test cases for player creation, skill creation, and various game scenarios

useskill.name: use skill
useskill.detail: Activates one of your skills to power or defend against the current boss
useskill.example: use skill fireball | use skill shield
